en.title: Dr Emoto's Seminar In Kuala Lumpur 03rd April 2010 A Great Success! (1)
en.content:
REPORT BY FE EVENT MANAGER PATRICK CHAN.
 
World Renowned Scientist Dr Masaru Emoto's Seminar in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia "The Power Of Scalar Energy Water" on 03rd April 2010 was a HUGE SUCCESS with over 2,000 participants who came from all over Malaysia and surrounding countries. It was one thing to read his best selling books, some of which sold over 2 million copies and another thing to see and hear him live, delivering his findings and research on "living" water. FE is very proud and honored to be able to bring Dr Emoto to share his knowledge and research with our Leaders and Members in Kuala Lumpur (03rd April 2010), Bangkok (04th April 2010), Jakarta (09th April 2010), Manila (10th April 2010) and Hong Kong (11th April 2010).

Highlights Of The Kuala Lumpur Event Include:
 
- Marching in of VIPs, Spokespersons and Presidential Directors led by Founder CEO Paul Ting and Founder Director KS Lee.
   
- Singing of "Quantum Pendant" Song on the stage.
   
- Opening Speech by Founder Director KS Lee.
   
- Sharing by Dr Amir Farid on "What is Scalar Energy?"
   
- Sharing by Dr Masaru Emoto on the "Power of Scalar Energize water."
   
- Demonstration of Quantum Pendant & Quantum Flask by Presidential Director KC Phoon & FusionExcel Spokesman Jean Daniel. First timers, as usual were amazed the power of FusionExcel's Quantum Pendant. Great job KC and Jean Daniel!
   
- Sharing by Master Coach Dev Singh, Bob Proctor's only Master Coach in Asia.
   
- Special Lucky Draw Brand New Proton Saga 1.3 and 10 consolation prizes.
   
- Presentation of Grand Prize - a fully paid brand new Proton Saga 1.3 to Lucky Draw Winner Presidential Directors Sam Kok Onn & Lai Pei San!
   
- Photo Session with Dr. Masaru Emoto.
 
A BIG THANK YOU to MC Lovey Lee and team who did a great job!

See You All At The Top!
< Click Here For More Photos >
